summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Blackhead Remover Set - Best Comedone Extractor - Whitehead & Blemish Removal Tools - Bundle 3 Pieces Premium Blackhead Whitehead Comedone Acne Pimple Remover Extractor Spot Cleaner - 100% Lifetime. Review Date: 2014/12/29 Store: Veluxio Naturals Product Description: ['Looking to eliminate blackheads, whiteheads and acnes? Then look no further...', 'Veluxio Naturals Extractor Tools for Skin Care Set are designed for precision control and comfort use.', '--- Our Guarantee ---', "We personally guarantee our products are made to the highest standards, that's why we offer a", 'Lifetime Guarantee!', 'So what are you waiting for?', 'Click the add to cart button now', 'to get this top quality Skin Care Set on its way to your door.'] Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Veluxio Naturals', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Item Weight': '23 Grams', 'Unit Count': '3 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 0.98 x 0.2 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '784672622271', 'Manufacturer': 'Veluxio Naturals'} Review Text: This blackhead remover set works wonders. These do the trick without trying to pop and squeeze the blackhead out with your fingers and leaving scars. Using this blackhead remover set makes your face look like you never had a blackhead. This been a lifesaver in my eyes 👀. Now my face is clear. I always struggled with blackheads and acne my whole life and could never find the right stuff to clear my face up. So I use this set and then use vitamin c moisturizer. Review Title: no more picking and scaring Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hyaluronic Acid Serum, Vibrant Elastic Skin Again, Scientifically Designed Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle Complex Packed With Vitamins A, C, D, And E-Superb Moisturizer Results In Timeless Glowing Skin Review Date: 2015/01/03 Store: HealthRoyals Product Description: ['A 1934 Japanese Discovery that is Turning Back the Hands of Time for Men and Women!', 'Hyaluronic Acid Serum—Nature’s Ancient Wrinkle Reducer', 'Say Goodbye to Wrinkles and Dry Skin', '- Get Compliments On Your Beautiful Skin- Gain relief from Environmental Damage, as this revolutionary serum reduces the damage from wind, pollution, sun, smoke and alcohol- Enjoy Radiant Skin-the radiance that you haven’t experienced since high school and a new glow after just a few applications- No More Sagging-Lessen Deep Lines and invigorate and plump dry skin,so there are fewer lines and wrinkles', 'There’s No Reason You Can’t Look 30 at 50!', 'It’s true! Women and men are discovering that it’s not only possible to look younger, but also to uncover a natural kind of beauty they never realized was there.', 'Discovered by Karl Meyer in 1934 after a visit to a Japanese village called Yuzuri Hara,a study was conducted to determine why both the aged men and women had smoother,wrinkle free skin,flexible joints and a full head of hair well. A high amount of oestrogen molecules in their diet from Soya and tofu caused cells to produce more hyaluronic acid. This naturally produced wrinkle remover is the secret behind skin hydration, the stimulation of collagen and maintaining skin elasticity. A decrease in Hyaluronic acid is shown to be a large part of the ageing process.', 'Hyaluronic Acid Serum Feeds Your Skin What It Needs To Bring Your Complexion Back To Life!', 'While Hyaluronic acid can be found in the collagen of skin and absorb up to 1000x its own weight in moisture, it can also be combined with sources from nature. With every use, you’ll see the radiance returning and the softness coming back.', 'Try it for 30 days!', 'Order now and prove it to yourself. Apply it, and see the transformation. If you aren’t satisfied, receive a full refund, no questions asked.'] Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'HealthRoyals', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 1.2 x 1.2 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HA223', 'UPC': '719239442054', 'Manufacturer': 'HealthRoyals'} Review Text: I use the Hyaluronic Acid Serum Cream in the morning after I do my daily cleansing routine, then go along and do my makeup and then again at night after I wash my face,. the Hyaluronic Acid Serum Cream leaves my face feeling smooth and helps with the bags I get under my eyes when I wake up. this is definitely recommended for anyone who is trying to make their face look youthful and help with skin aging. It helps with my face after spending a lot of time in the tanning salon or laying out in the sun. this product has all the ingredients that your face needs to remain healthy, all you need is a little pump and it covers your whole face. I also noticed it helps with clearing up my acne. I had tried other Hyaluronic Acid Serums but they didn't work as well. Review Title: this is definitely recommended for anyone who is trying to make their face ... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Grow Longer Fuller Eyelashes - Long Eyelashes are Beautiful Eyelashes - Lashes in Bloom Promotes Eyelash Growth - Includes a Free eBook full of Natural Beauty Tips - This Advanced Eyelash Serum is Backed by Our 100% Satisfaction Guarantee - So Order Yours Today! Review Date: 2015/02/19 Store: Cheeva Beauty Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '5.1 x 0.8 x 0.8 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '820103892230 794168102767'} Review Text: The eyelash serum is amazing for making your lashes longer. I noticed a difference in mine. Mine grew about an inch since using. I always had a decent size lash but always wanted bigger and bolder. Its easy to apply. You apply to clean lashes /face cleansing. Start from bottom to top as you would with regular mascara. Its not messy or sticky . this serum is lightweight and you will definitely see results after continuous use. I noticed about a week later. I apply it morning and night. when I do it in the morning I let it dry before I apply my mascara.
The package came not damaged and shipping was quick and convienient. I had no issues. Review Title: The eyelash serum is amazing for making your lashes longer Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Neitsi Soft Professinal Boar Bristle Hairbrush Detangling Brush Review Date: 2015/06/19 Store: NEITSI Average Rating: 3.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'NEITSI', 'Color': 'Black', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Boar', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6 x 1.2 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'ZMbrush', 'UPC': '712096351958'} Review Text: I love this 100% soft boar bristle brush. I use it to brush out my extensions and also to smooth out the bumps on my natural hair when putting it up in a ponytail or another style. I like this brush better than the hard boar bristles that leave my head hurting from brushing.

Using this leaves both my hair and extensions looking flawless. It is small enough for me to carry around in my purse for needed touchups.

My hubby even took advantage of using it to brush out his beard and he said he likes the way it feels. It leaves his beard feeling smooth and tangle free.

The brush came packaged niceley and was not damaged. Also arrived quickly. Review Title: leaves my hair and extensions flawless Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual demonstrates a clear inclination towards skincare products that address specific beauty concerns, particularly related to acne management, anti-aging, and enhancing appearance (e.g., eyelash growth). Patterns in ratings reveal high satisfaction with effective results, notably 5-star ratings for products that led to visible improvements in skin clarity and texture, while mediocre ratings highlight frustration with less effective items. A consistent preference for multifunctionality is evident, as they favor products that serve multiple purposes, like a serum that tackles aging and acne simultaneously.

The person's purchase history indicates a strong focus on quality, favoring products with natural ingredients and effective results over average ratings. Price sensitivity appears moderate; they are willing to invest in quality items that deliver results rather than opting for the cheapest options. The presence of lifetime guarantees or satisfaction promises also suggests a desire for assurance when purchasing skincare. Additionally, they value products with practicality, appreciating items that are user-friendly and effective for their grooming routines.

In essence, this individual's core preferences center around effective, quality skincare solutions that promise visible results, with a particular emphasis on acne treatment and youthful appearance, underlined by a practical and experience-driven approach to beauty products.

target_interaction.title: highly matte lippies.
target_interaction.text:
I am totally obsessed with all 24 of the chialstar velvet matte lipstick. They come in a clear plastic tube, which makes it easy to pick a color without opening each lid to see what color I want to use. The colors are also labeled on the cap. This set comes with a pink bag with a string for storage or if you want to take a few on the go. The bag fits in my purse without taking up space.

Using these are a tad sticky and long lasting also waterproof. The color dries in under 60 seconds. The only way to get it off is with makeup remover or I use coconut oil. These lasted me a whole day without reapplying.

The best part about having all these colors is you can do an ombre look, have a color to match all outfits. Also with these 24 colors, they range from lite to dark , which makes it perfect for all seasons.

When I apply for best results I use a lite color liner, chapstick and then apply color. I typically do 2 coats of color.

I highly recommend these if you are looking for a set of matte color lipstick. These are perfect if you are a makeup artist or a lipstick addict. The price is reasonable.

For people using mattes for the first time, it is going to be sticky at first before drying , so don't be disappointed with the texture. Also when drying leave your lips separated and don't blot because you will mess it up n get tissue stuck to your lips.
target_interaction.title_meta: Chialstar Lip Gloss Stick Makeup Waterproof Velvet Matte 24 Full Color Lipstick and Chialstar Storage Bag (24pcs) by Chialstar
